body.p: The undersigned acquaintances and neighbors of Dr R. J. D. Robb state & know that the facts stated by him in his Petition and affidavit to the Govenor in relation his life being threatend by N. G. V. Henderson and true and that upon the trial of the indictment He could have proved said threats in justification for his carrying concealed a deadly weapon and we think Justice and equity require the interference of the Executive Clemency in remitting the fine imposed and that said R. J. D. Robb is a man of Honesty probity and good demeanor and his statements are to be relied upon to the fullest extent.
This is to certify that I have been boarding at the same house with Dr R. J. D. Robb for more than two years and having been treating him and know him to be an invalid

A. J. Mason M D
M. P. H. Holland C, A, C
William Johnson
Wm M. S. Sledge
Samuel D Kenbey
E Pruitt
A J Mason M, D
M. B. Worley

Allen E & C Court
